places.name: India Gate
places.description: India Gate is a war memorial located in New Delhi, along Rajpath, dedicated to the 82,000 soldiers, both Indian and British.

places.name: Red Fort
places.description: The Red Fort is a historical fort in the old Delhi area, on the banks of Yamuna area, on the banks of Yamuna.

places.name: Qutub Minar
places.description: Qutub Minar is a minaret or a victory tower located in the Qutub complex, a UNESCO World Heritage Site in Delhi's Mehrauli area.

places.name: Lotus Temple
places.description: Located in the national capital of New Delhi, the Lotus Temple is an edifice dedicated to the Bahá'í faith.
